general.name: Hikari
general.description: Hikari 「光」 is a basic color grading tool, completely built to run in a web browser. It can perform basic color manipulation on image files.

details.heading: The light
details.description: Hikari 「光」, japanese for "light", was built for simple and instant image manipulation on the web.

boxes.title: Technologies
boxes.label: Image rendering is built in C and performed on the web using WebAssembly within a webworker.

boxes.title: Source Code
boxes.label: The whole source code is available on Github.

boxes.title: Live version
boxes.label: Play around with it. It's completely free and available online.

general.name: wastend
general.description: wastend is a mobile app for android and iOS, created to keep track of groceries and other consumable goods at home.

details.heading: Why I created wastend
details.description: This is my first full-fledged flutter application and I wanted it to have a purpose and maybe even be useful for me.

boxes.title: Technologies
boxes.label: It was built using Flutter and NestJS.

boxes.title: Source Code
boxes.label: The whole source code is available on Github.

general.name: ryoko
general.description: ryoko is a project management tool, designed for developers or other small- to medium sized teams to plan their tasks effectively.

details.heading: A bit of history
details.description: This web application initially started as a university project. It was built using modern web technologies and completely designed by ourselves.

boxes.title: Technologies
boxes.label: It was built using React, NodeJS, SCSS and PostgreSQL

boxes.title: Source Code
boxes.label: The whole source code is available on Github.

general.name: DLS
general.description: Data Logging Solutions (short DLS) is a service to track statistics for soapbox drivers, for which I created a simple yet effective User Interface.

general.name: hazy days
general.description: This one is for all the hazy days, for all the days that seem to have no hope, yet where sunshine is waiting behind the clouds.

details.heading: A quite random collection
details.description: In this collection I will be adding all photos with hazy feeling.
